The Changji Tengda Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Changji region of Xinjiang

operators: Xinjiang Changji Heze Tengda Mining Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Xinjiang Changji Heze Tengda Mining Company, which is fully owned by Tai'an Changhong Trading Company.
